responses.text: Why don't you blow this joint and come with me?

dynamic_line.gendered_line: I got my rights to be here, chum.  Squatter's rights!

responses.text: Don't worry, I'm not going to hurt you.
Hey, good to see you're still around.

dynamic_line: I got here first, therefore this place belongs to me.  Them's the rules in the <the_cataclysm>.

responses.text: Now that's an archaic belief.  I'll see you around.

dynamic_line.yes: I ain't leaving, <name_g>.  Not until you or someone else has checked out that nightmare for me.

no.yes: Thanks, <name_g>.  I sure owe you one.
no.no: I ain't leaving, <name_g>.  Not until that eldritch screeching nightmare is dead 'n buried.

dynamic_line.gendered_line: That ain't the point here, chum.  Don'tcha get it?  This was MY territory, but they took it away from me.  Now they think of us as nothin' but a <swear> nuisance.

dynamic_line: Who I was is gone, dead… died when I put down the monsters wearing the face of my friends.  Ever since then, I've felt nothing but disgust for myself.  Let's not <swear> reminisce.
They are nice people, lettin' us stay here 'n all.  I got friends here, and while we may not be members we belong here.  We'll fight together if they ever try to kick us out.
It ain't so bad.  I got shelter, heat, and people to defend me if any <zombie> shuffles its way in here.  If I want to eat then I'll be doin' construction work all day.
Food is just the thing a starving man needs.  Thanks for the help, <name_g>.

dynamic_line.gendered_line: Ha ha ha!  Think before you speak, chum.  Eight icons for an honest day's work, I say the system's broken!

responses.text: Sorry to hear that.  What were you saying before?

dynamic_line.gendered_line: Ain't you heard it?  It's been screeching out in the forest during the night for a while now, keeps me up sometimes.  I'm too scared to go out and see what that thing is.  If you'd kill it, I'd be in your debt forever.

responses.text: I'll see what I can do.
I'm sorry to hear that <name_g>, but I don't feel like facing it either.

yes.gendered_line: After what you did for me, I'll follow you to the ends of the Earth!  No one around here's stood up for me like that, I owe ya one.

dynamic_line.no: No chance!  Its not you, its the world out there I'm worried about.  All those <swear> monsters really give me the creeps, and as far as I know this church is the last bastion of humanity in the <the_cataclysm>.
